description:
Modern hotel with alfresco dining near Barclaycard Arena

Short walk to ICC

In the Brindleyplace canalside development, with shops and restaurants, Hilton Garden Inn Birmingham Brindleyplace is a 3-minute walk from Broad Street and the Ikon Gallery. The International Convention Center (ICC) is a 6-minute walk; Barclaycard Arena is 11 minutes on foot.

Cruising the canal

You can walk 4 minutes to visit the National Sea Life Centre or hop aboard a canal cruise. The famous Jewellery Quarter is a 4-minute drive; 10 minutes leads to Bullring Centre for shopping and the Hippodrome for world-class performances, including musicals, opera, and ballet.

24-hour snacks

The City Café opens to a large terrace, perfect for dining alfresco on a warm day. You can enjoy a drink and light bites in the lounge, stop by the 24-hour grocery store for a midnight snack, and get a healthy workout in the fitness center.

Free WiFi, iMac® TV/PC

Each modern, smoke-free guestroom features free WiFi and something extra-cool: an Apple iMac TV/PC entertainment system with sports channels. Rooms also have floor-to-ceiling windows and handy perks like mini-fridges and coffee/tea makers.

DESCRIPTION.value:
Modern hotel with alfresco dining near Barclaycard Arena

Short walk to ICC

In the Brindleyplace canalside development, with shops and restaurants, Hilton Garden Inn Birmingham Brindleyplace is a 3-minute walk from Broad Street and the Ikon Gallery. The International Convention Center (ICC) is a 6-minute walk; Barclaycard Arena is 11 minutes on foot.

Cruising the canal

You can walk 4 minutes to visit the National Sea Life Centre or hop aboard a canal cruise. The famous Jewellery Quarter is a 4-minute drive; 10 minutes leads to Bullring Centre for shopping and the Hippodrome for world-class performances, including musicals, opera, and ballet.

24-hour snacks

The City Café opens to a large terrace, perfect for dining alfresco on a warm day. You can enjoy a drink and light bites in the lounge, stop by the 24-hour grocery store for a midnight snack, and get a healthy workout in the fitness center.

Free WiFi, iMac® TV/PC

Each modern, smoke-free guestroom features free WiFi and something extra-cool: an Apple iMac TV/PC entertainment system with sports channels. Rooms also have floor-to-ceiling windows and handy perks like mini-fridges and coffee/tea makers.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
The hotel offers a restaurant. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. This 4-star property offers access to a business center and meeting rooms.

A computer station is located on site and high-speed wireless Internet access is complimentary. 6 meeting rooms are available. This business-friendly hotel also offers a fitness center, a terrace, and barbecue grills. Parking is available onsite for a surcharge.

Hilton Garden Inn Birmingham Brindley Place is a smoke-free property.

DINING.value:
English breakfasts are available for a surcharge and are served each morning between 7 AM and 10 AM.
City Cafe - This restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
Room service (during limited hours) is available.

RECREATION.value: The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or nearby; fees may apply.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Location
Located in the heart of Birmingham, this hotel is within a 10-minute walk of Brindleyplace, International Convention Centre, and Barclaycard Arena. Big Brum and Victoria Square are also within 15 minutes.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Fee for English breakfast: GBP 14.95 per person (approximately)
  • Self parking fee: GBP 12.50 per night
  • Rollaway beds are available for an additional fee

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

ACCESSIBILITY_OPTION.value: To make requests for specific accessibility needs, complete the "Special or Accessibility Requests" section of "Trip Preferences" when you book your hotel.

ROOM_FEATURE.value: Hilton Garden Inn Birmingham Brindley Place offers a great location, putting you within just a 10-minute walk of International Convention Centre and Barclaycard Arena. Guests can visit the fitness center for a workout or grab a bite to eat at City Cafe, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. A bar/lounge and a terrace are other highlights, and rooms at this upscale hotel offer MP3 docks and flat-screen TVs.
